    • Method Detail

      • using

        public IdibonAPI using(HttpInterface httpIntf)
        Configure the HTTP interface that the client should use. Must be called exactly once.
        Parameters:
        httpIntf - HttpInterface implementation to use for this client instance.

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown(long quiesceTime)
        Waits for pending operations to complete and shuts down any execution threads that were created.
        Parameters:
        quiesceTime - The maximum time to wait, in milliseconds.

      • collection

        public Collection collection(String name)
        Returns the cached Collection object with the provided name.

      • waitFor

        public void waitFor(HttpFuture<?>... futures)
             throws IOException
        Wait for one or more asynchronous operations to complete. Same as calling #waitFor(Arrays.asList(futures)).
        Parameters:
        futures - List of operations to synchronize on completion.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • waitFor

        public void waitFor(Iterable<HttpFuture<?>> futures)
             throws IOException
        Wait for one or more asynchronous operations to complete. If an exception occurs on one of the pending operations, the method waits for other operations to complete then throws the exception that occurred.
        Parameters:
        futures - List of operations to wait for completion.
        Throws:
        IOException
